attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As it becomes more apparent that his initiative is on course for a recovery, certain Cabinet Ministers are seeking to undermine his position through manipulations designed to drum up support for his replacement, in the expectation that they will then secure an easy ride as PM on the back of the recovery that he has engineered, and for which they may even hope to take the credit. Every schoolboy knows who they are. It's time to get rid of them.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
